text:
Mid-December, in a city swept by cold winds―
A dark, silent school route in the dead of night with no one around.

Suspicious shadows with hoods pulled low over their eyes
were now softly creeping up behind a single student.

...Hey, big brother.
You are a 'Black Santa', arentcha'?

name: Black Santa
text: ―Eh?

The moment the man turned around, his vision was sealed in darkness.
A moment later, he realized a paper bag had been put over his head.

name: Black Santa
text:
Uwaah, what are you doing!?
Hey, stop! Stop it!!

name: Black Santa
text:
Guh...! W-What is your goal!?
Please, don't hurt me―!!

The young man had his limbs bound and was pushed down to the roadside.
His muscles stiffened from the cold of the pavement along with his fear.

Haha, don't be so scared. We don't plan to
hurt you or anything. At least, 'this time around'.

Someone crouched down and spoke in a menacing voice―
But it was the voice of a boy that still retained its youth.

Stay like this for a while,
and take your time rolling around.

Our demands for you are written on this card.
Read it when the cold has soaked into your body, then dispose of it properly.

A stiff piece of paper is slipped between his wrist and the rope.
Then, another, different youthful voice added coldly from above.

Though― To put it simply,
the demand just means 'Don't touch us'.

name: Black Santa
text:
......'Us'?
You... Who on earth are you guys―!?

Time goes back slightly, to the afternoon of the same day.
Shinjuku Academy, close to the closing ceremony, in a bright classroom after school―

name: Kengo
text:
Argh, the exams are finally over!
Now it's just meaningless attendance until the closing ceremony!

name: Kengo
text:
Exam periods really make your shoulders stiff,
or make your body dull― Anyway, it was the worst!

name: Shiro
text:
It is true the load is off our shoulders, but Kengo,
you barely even held a pen, so which part of you is stiff...?

options.text: I think I did well this time!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shiro
dialogue_after_selection.text:
That's better than anything. Shall we compete on whose grades are higher?
The loser will be the 'next' one on Kengo-duty―

dialogue_after_selection.name: Kengo
dialogue_after_selection.text:
What 'Kengo-duty', you overbearing four-eyes!?
You want me to tell [Player] about your last Christmas!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shiro
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...! M-My apologies.
Sorry, I certainly got carried away.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shiro
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...However, the end of the year is right ahead of us before we even knew it.
We'll have to look back later on whether we achieved our aspirations and goals for the year.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shiro
dialogue_after_selection.text: [Player]... That is why I warned you until I was blue in the face to do things you needed to do...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shiro
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...However, the end of the year is right ahead of us before we even knew it.
We'll have to look back later on whether we achieved our aspirations and goals for the year.

options.text: Another year coming to an end, that was fast~

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shiro
dialogue_after_selection.text:
The end of the year is right ahead of us before we even knew it.
We'll have to look back later on whether we achieved our aspirations and goals for the year.

name: Shiro
text:
Right. Since it's this time of year, perhaps we
can hear Ryota's annual parody of 'that song'?

name: Ryota
text:
Fufu, President, I didn't know you actually liked it!
It's becoming a habit after all, isn't it?

name: Ryota
text:
Since it's a special occasion, I guess I can answer your request.
Alright then, here I go this year too? ...Ready, set!

name: Ryota
text:
How many moooore nights to sleep~♪
Until Christmaaaaas~~~~♪

name: Ryota
text:
On Christmas, we eat pizza~♪
And then paella, and meat pie~♪

name: Ryota
text:
...Really, I can't sing it after all! Uwaaah!
I mean― It's a Christmas without [Player]!

name: Shiro
text:
―H-He went from a full smile to
completely bawling his eyes out...!?

name: Shiro
text:
W-Well... You are exaggerating it a bit.
[Player] will only be gone for the rest of the year, you know?

name: Shiro
text:
They plan to return right after Christmas,
so we can just have a party together then.

options.text: It's only for a little while.

name: Ryota
text:
But, there's a possibility they'll stay over there, right?
They are being scouted to go after all...
Ugh, it's scary to think about...

name: Shiro
text:
Your imagination is too strong... Anyway, if we don't send them off with a smile,
[Player] won't be able to depart feeling good either, right?

name: Shiro
text:
Well, I do think the timing is halfway done,
and I understand the feeling of loneliness well, but...

name: Kengo
text:
―Keh, but following that guy Toji,
I didn't expect you to go to Police Academy too, partner.

name: Kengo
text:
It's not that I want to spend Christmas with you or anything,
but come back quickly, yeah? It's kinda boring without you.

name: Ryota
text:
Hey, don't be stubbornly weird, Kengo!
This isn't the time to hide that you're lonely!!

name: Kengo
text:
W-Weirdly stubborn...!?
Wait, Ryota's pressure is awfully strong―!?

name: Ryota
text:
Hey, you really know it, right [Player]?
Or rather― I want you to really know it.

name: Ryota
text:
Just how much all of us
love you, [Player]!!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Ryota
dialogue_after_selection.text:
But still, you decided to go, so that's just how it is.
...It's unfair, but I can't say anything to that.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Ryota
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Nah, I absolutely love you more!!
...But, I'll believe those words, [Player].

dialogue_after_selection.name: Ryota
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Really?
Then, why would you bother transferring―

name: Ryota
text:
...Sorry for saying things like that.
I didn't mean to trouble you.

name: Ryota
text:
You know, when Toji came to Shinjuku, I thought we'd stick forever.
I didn't think he'd actually transfer to Police Academy.

name: Ryota
text:
Of course, Toji is still our friend.
That won't change no matter where he goes, but...

There, Ryota lowered his gaze.
After a long pause, he forces a smile.

Then, as if managing to bundle
his many complex feelings into one―

name: Ryota
text:
Anyway... Do come back, won't you!
Let's meet again soon! If anything, I'll come to see you!!

Leaving the school building, the severe winter cold attacks.
The white of breaths, rising to the sky like smoldering smoke.

Not stopping the pace, as [Player] tried to pass through the school gate,
someone called out to them from behind.

name: Jinn
text:
When it gets to be this season, everyone breathes smoke like me.
Hey [Player], at least let me see your face before you go.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
What, it's not like this is our final farewell.
No matter what happens from here on out, you are my precious student, you know?

options.text: Did you come to see me off?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
That's exactly it, you are my precious student.
The least I could do as a teacher is to give you a heartful cheer, right?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
You're making this so depressing~
Before I send you off, I'll give you some of my passionate student guidance tips.

name: Jinn
text:
...Though, when you were nominated by the Kiou Police Academy,
I didn't think such an unreasonable story would be decided.

name: Jinn
text:
You definitely aren't living in the dorms, but in Kabukicho, right?
I did hear that the forces there don't exactly get along well with the police.

name: Jinn
text:
Ah, so basically, did your guardians―
Or rather, the group acting as 'substitute guardians', not oppose it?

options.text: Everyone is overprotective in their own way, but...

name: Suzuka
text:
―Well, you're free do as you like.
Personal feelings aside, the police aren't particularly enemies.

name: Suzuka
text:
Besides, it's proven that having an 'insider' in the police isn't bad.
...Just so you know, I'm not talking about that festival guy from Kabukicho, alright?

name: Suzuka
text:
No, 'that idiot' is a different breed of festival-loving people too, but...
If it's you, I'm sure you'll be useful to Kabukicho like he is.

name: Gyobu
text:
Haha, in youth, everything is experience.
It's good that your perspective can broaden, Miss Suzuka.

name: Gyobu
text:
Besides, the Lord's choice of study abroad destination
has to do with the school friend made in Shinjuku, but―

name: Gyobu
text:
The fact that 'that mischievous boy' is there is a big reason too, right?
From what I see, he's not too bad of a big brother figure.

name: Gyobu
text:
If that's the 'circumstance', we can send you off with peace of mind.
Company in travel, compassion in life― Have a safe trip.

name: Tetsuya
text:
It's better than staying in the shade with us.
We don't have any reason to stop you, so go wherever you like.

name: Tetsuya
text:
However, if you settle down with the police...
Never set your foot into Kabukicho again―

name: Tetsuya
text:
...That's what I'd like to say, but having a special 'precedent' makes it tricky.
Oi, just make sure to not get too influenced by that two-timing bastard.

name: Y'golonac
text:
―Nooo! Absolutely, absolutely not! Why...
W-Why is [Player] going to the police of all places!?

name: Y'golonac
text:
And then, if by any chance you join the cops on momentum―
Changing your 'nomination' to a senior police officer... Such a development is possible!

name: Y'golonac
text:
And in the 'end', you'll leave Uncle!
Along with a note saying you got sick of Uncle's slovenliness!

name: Y'golonac
text:
Uwaaah! Don't go, [Player]!
Uncle won't leave his socks off anymore!?

dialogue_after_selection.text: [Player]'s voice no longer reached Y'golonac at all, who had entered his own world and was indulging in his 'nasty' delusions.
[Player]'s voice no longer reached Y'golonac at all, who had entered his own world and was indulging in his 'nasty' delusions.

name: Y'golonac
text:
Damn, things turning out like this
is definitely all 'his' fault...!!

name: Jinn
text:
―I see. So basically, it's not that there was no opposition,
but you were basically respected... Is that right?

name: Jinn
text:
That's good then... Before I send you off,
just one thing― I wanted to tell you just this.

name: Jinn
text:
Listen, [Player]!
Make sure to come back to this school... to Shinjuku Academy!!

name: Jinn
text:
If I'm being honest, I wanted Toji to
stay with us so badly if it was even possible!

name: Jinn
text:
I know that choosing a path, a future
is all up to you guys but... Guh...

name: Jinn
text:
You're still my precious student!
Won't, won't you promise to your teacher you'll come back!?

Thus the next day― At the Kiou Police Academy's morning assembly,
the gazes of police officers were poured onto [Player] on the stage.

name: Hogen
text:
So, that concludes the introduction of [Player], the exchange student from
Shinjuku Academy who belongs to Kiou Police Academy as of today.

name: Hogen
text:
Hohoho, speaking of the year-end, it is a time when crime increases drastically.
I'll have you work hard right away here, okay?

name: Tajikarao
text:
I welcome you, [Player]-dono!
The crisp police uniform suits you veeeery well!

name: Tajikarao
text:
But my oh my, although short term, for the day to come where that
[Player]-dono becomes this officer's junior... I'm truly overwhelmed with emotions!

name: Tajikarao
text:
If you have any trouble, be sure rely on
your Senior Patrol Officer immediately, alright!?

name: Oguchi Magami
text:
The day might come where I investigate together with [Player]-dono―
Just from that fact, my tail is shaking with anticipation already!

name: Toji
text:
―Welcome, [Player].
To think the day would come where we stand shoulder to shoulder again like this.

name: Toji
text:
That figure, it looks good on you more than I imagined.
It was worth strongly recommending you as a candidate.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tajikarao
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Oooh... As I thought, 'senpai' has a nice ring to it...
To serve as a model, I will work harder than ever!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Oguchi Magami
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Of course!
But me being a senior...
I wonder if I can lead properly...?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Oguchi Magami
dialogue_after_selection.text:
And perhaps―
Since I've become a senior, [Player]-dono won't pat my head...!?

options.text: Let's do this here too, Toji.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Toji
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ah, but here I am the senior.
In front of others, please know your place and call me 'Toji-senpai'.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Toji
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Heh, I'm just joking.
You don't have to worry about it that much.
Of course, if you do want to call me that, I won't stop you.

text:
At that moment, from outside, a sound echoed that could
only be thought of as that of a modified engine.

Echoing the loud sound of brakes,
there was a car that arrived in front of the police station with a four-wheel drift.

Popular as always, ain't ya, [Player].
But, the one who recommended you was me, y'know?

A low, rough voice follows after.
The owner of the voice― The gazes of the place concentrate on the rear door.

Wearing giant gauntlet gloves,
opening the door, a large tiger beastman appeared.

Wrapped in a uniform over fur with contrasting black and white,
beneath the cap, his sharp eyes released a mischievous light.

name: Black Delinquent Cop Tiger?
text:
Yoo, it's been quite a while, [Player].
Was it since we met at Tsukuyomi's Club?

name: Black Delinquent Cop Tiger?
text:
Ah, or was it when we ate barbecue with Tetsuox's group?
Or when we rode in the car with Uncle Gyobu―

note: we know his name but it's still undetermined :(

options.text: Jagannath, so you recommended me too.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Black Delinquent Cop Tiger?
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Yeah, that's right.
Thought it might be nice for me to have someone I can entrust my back to, y'know?

options.text: It's been a while since we beat up those brats together.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Black Delinquent Cop Tiger?
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Heheh. Right, right.
You'll show me more of that action, won't you?

options.text: (Stare at him like you've never seen him before)

dialogue_after_selection.name: Black Delinquent Cop Tiger?
dialogue_after_selection.text: Haha, I know that you think of me as a good big brother, but you don't have to give me a reaction like that.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Black Delinquent Cop Tiger?
dialogue_after_selection.text: Rather, with that look on your face, you aren't gonna say you forgot about me, are you?

name: Black Delinquent Cop Tiger?
text:
Whether you're a goodie-two-shoes or a bad companion,
I'll have you follow my lead here.

name: Jagannath
text:
That's right, to your big brother here,
Jagannath-sama, yoooo!

name: Daikoku
text:
...Hmph. As usual,
how blatantly late, Jagannath-kun.

name: Daikoku
text:
How long has it been since you submitted a written apology for ramming the
modified patrol car into the school building and completely destroying it the other day?

name: Daikoku
text:
Being you, you're going to say you were doing
a precautionary patrol of the back alleys again, aren't you?

name: Jagannath
text:
Oooh, correct answer, dear Police Chief.
I am quite literally a local 'policeman', after all.

name: Jagannath
text:
The brats in the city are dangerous anyway.
Playing with them until they find it annoying is just right.

name: Toji
text:
Jagannath...
Even you recommended [Player]...?

name: Toji
text:
―! Hogen-sensei, don't tell me this time,
the one in charge of guiding [Player] is―

When the startled Toji turned his face to the teacher on the platform,
Hogen answered while stroking his rich white beard.

name: Hogen
text:
Ah, about that story...
Actually, a certain case occurred last night.

name: Hogen
text:
Due to its nature, I wanted to entrust the investigation to Jagannath,
but I judged that someone to perform assistance was necessary this time.

name: Hogen
text:
We don't have much time in our hands, so I'll have them work hard right away―
That was what I meant when I stated it earlier.

name: Jagannath
text:
―That's what he says.
Heheh, sorry 'bout that, honor student.

name: Toji
text:
...The police is a world of hierarchy.
I am fully aware of that point, unlike you.

Laughing roughly with a short breath,
Jagannath sits calmly at his desk.

Cold gazes gather at that appearance,
and whispers of backbiting spread from each seat.

name: Police Academy Student
text:
...Goddamn, what is that attitude?
Far from a bad cop, he's practically a corrupt cop.

name: Police Academy Student
text:
Why is he allowed to do whatever he wants?
Well, with that strength of his, I guess he is a usable piece.

name: Police Academy Student
text:
Whether true or false, rumor has it he's a cop by day and MMA fighter by night,
and doing double schooling with Kudan Martial Arts Academy.

name: Police Academy Student
text:
Being attached to such a half-wit, I pity the rookie too...
But, since Jagannath recommended them himself,
they might be the same kind despite appearances.

name: Police Academy Student
text:
Or rather, what does it mean to receive a recommendation from Jagannath and
Toji at the same time? They are practically oil and water, right?

options.text: Could it be that Jagannath is hated?
I'm bathed in attention from day one...
(Glare at him to blame the rumors)

name: Toji
text:
...You guys, refrain from private talk unrelated to duty.
So, what is the case that occurred?

name: Hogen
text:
Umu. Then, the welcoming ceremony for our new rookie ends here,
so shall we move to the regular information briefing, Chief Daikoku?

name: Daikoku
text:
Ah, I don't mind. I also want to see
[Player]'s working manner promptly.

name: Daikoku
text:
Now, take a seat, [Player].
The desk― conveniently next to Jagannath-kun is open.

name: Hogen
text:
Well then, I will share
the handover info from the night duty.

name: Hogen
text:
This is clearly a criminal case rather than just some usual matter...
Late last night, multiple Santa School students were attacked simultaneously.

name: Hogen
text:
Their vision was stolen by a bag over their head from behind,
limbs bound, and abandoned on the street― A vicious incident.

name: Hogen
text:
The culprits claim they have no intention of causing injury,
but as a result, albeit minor, there are injured people.

name: Toji
text:
Restraining the body and abandoning them on a road in a midwinter night―
That would fall under confinement resulting in injury, not just assault.

name: Toji
text:
If it's a crime that systematically targets Santas,
normally it should be seen as a robbery case for money or goods, but...

name: Jagannath
text:
...This isn't a type of robbery.
And mostly, the ones targeted were the Black Santa bunch, right?

Reward and Compensation― Santas are broadly divided into two by 'Role'.
Attention gathered on Jagannath's statement limiting it to one side.

name: Hogen
text:
That is correct. A card-like threat letter was left at the scene, and there was a
statement demanding the suspension of Black Santas' activities for this year.

name: Toji
text:
...I see.
In that case, the age group of the culprits is―

name: Hogen
text:
―Umu. I cannot say for certain,
but we can make some guesses.

name: Hogen
text:
And, this is not certain information, but there is
only one new force that is highly likely to contain the culprits.

name: Tajikarao
text:
Anti-social forces, is what you mean?
What kind of force would that be―

name: Hogen
text:
Hoho, I thought you would know that yourself.
It's the color gang made of the delinquent boys from underground Ikebukuro.

color gang: group of Japanese delinquent kids dressing up like America's street gangs
(idk about you, but being American is the least thing I'd like to imitate)

name: Tajikarao
text:
―Of the underground Ikebukuro!? But... that semi-gang force should have
disappeared with the rise of that Treasure Temple's Demon Child?

name: Hogen
text:
That Oniwaka started attending school, and promptly became absent.
And, of the person who fit perfectly into that empty hole―

name: Hogen
text:
No, it seems the organization reformed naturally in the
form of the delinquent boys gathering under 'those people'.

name: Daikoku
text:
Fufu, having personal interest is fine,
but that is unrelated to this case. Concentrate and listen, won't you?

name: Daikoku
text:
I am expecting work utilizing 'that temperament' of yours,
but do not forget that you are strictly under my organization.

name: Hogen
text:
―Ahem.
Ah, may I continue?

name: Hogen
text:
So, there is a high probability that this case falls under juvenile crime,
but needless to say, the charges are by no means minor.

name: Hogen
text:
Considering organization, planning, and past delinquency history,
I must say the possibility of it being equivalent to criminal punishment is extremely high.

name: Hogen
text:
Depending on the investigation results, we will move to secure custody,
but either way, this will be a delicate matter.

name: Jagannath
text:
―Ha, I see.
So the white feathered arrow was directed at me.

name: Jagannath
text:
A completely correct choice, old man.
If you pass delicate matters to me, there won't be any problem.

name: Toji
text:
Who are you to say that? There is no way we can expect a
grounded investigation from a bad cop who only disturbs the norms.

name: Toji
text:
The fact that you have many points of contact with the brats―
You being chosen for the mission is for that one reason alone.

name: Jagannath
text:
Hmm, awfully aggressive, aren't you?
Are you that displeased that I am taking charge of guiding [Player]?

name: Jagannath
text:
But, heheh. Sorry, this one is mine to take.
After all, having hanged out in Kabukicho for quite some time, there's an inseparable bond.

name: Jagannath
text:
Besides― No matter how you think about it, they are on my side, don't you say?
Mistakenly or not, not on the side of a square like you.

name: Toji
text:
What? We may not have spent much time together,
but both [Player] and I have been through a lot together in Shinjuku.

name: Toji
text:
Certainly, they do sometimes show aspects un-police-like, and
sometimes I want to bash my head at a wall at their inexplicable behavior, but―

name: Toji
text:
Despite this, [Player]'s essence is straight,
I believe somewhere in my heart... No, I want to believe in that!!

options.text: Being too popular is also a sin... I suppose.

name: Hogen
text:
Hohoho,
both of you should leave it at that.

name: Hogen
text:
To repeat, wasn't it you who warned the surroundings
to refrain from private talk unrelated to duty, Toji?

name: Toji
text:
Hah, that is― I apologize.
It is immature of me to take the bait of such obvious provocation, but I just...

name: Hogen
text:
Umu, everything is fine. Anyway, this case was made
shortly after receiving a simple report from the school.

name: Hogen
text:
Therefore, Jagannath, [Player], I'll
leave the investigation plan to you― Hm?

Hogen's words stopped midway,
because there was someone who stood up abruptly on the spot.

name: Jagannath
text:
Well then, first I'll go listen to the story at the Santa School.
―Come on, don't space out, you stand up too, [Player]!

name: Hogen
text:
―Good grief, what a free-spirited fellow.
Just when I thought he arrived spectacularly late,
to think he would spectacularly leave in half-way.

name: Hogen
text:
Being able to move on instant decision is your strong point,
but make sure you don't get too eager and make a blunder, okay?

Jagannath, who responded by raising his right eyebrow with a vertical scar,
next looked at [Player] and smiled provocatively.

name: Jagannath
text:
Now. Whether you understand or not, I'll say it in advance,
because I'm the type to show it with actions more than words.

name: Jagannath
text:
Watch my way well and learn it weeeell, alright?
Especially, the 'speed of switching gears'―!!

name: Jagannath
text:
So with that said... [Player],
shut up and follow meeee―!!

The two visited the Santa School for investigation as Christmas approached.
Perhaps due to the season, the school is overflowing with considerable liveliness.

Perhaps everyone here is concerned about 'that incident', but
for the sake of the children, they must concentrate on what is in front of them.

Thus the two police officers, while gathering some interest from the students,
were guided to the principal's office warmed by the fireplace.

name: Ded
text:
Ah, thank you for coming. It must be a busy time for both of us at year-end,
so I'd like to apologize for making you come all this way.

name: Tanngrisnir
text:
What's more, you've arrived in this bitterly cold weather.
Please, have some of my special stew.
It will warm you from the core of your body.

name: Jagannath
text:
Thanks. Even if you say we're busy,
it's probably not as much as you guys.
Thank you for making time for us.

Responding with a gentle smile, Ded in the principal's seat
softly shifted his gaze to [Player] next to him.

name: Ded
text:
Well now, I am indeed surprised though.
[Player], when did you decide to become a police officer?

name: Ded
text:
If you were thinking of transferring, I would have been happy
if you added our Santa School to the list of your candidates too.

note: yes yes yes yes yes I need a story on Santa School

options.text: The police uniform suits me, right?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Ded
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Fufu, from any angle you look like a fine police officer.
I never dreamed that you would come.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Ded
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I see, so the Police Academy scouted you.
Hmm... By next year, maybe I should prepare some excuse for solicitation too?

options.text: But I don't really have the aptitude to be a Santa...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Ded
dialogue_after_selection.text:
In the sense of aptitude, that is true.
But, if you still want to do it, the current me would have supported you with all my might.

name: Ded
text:
―Now. As much as I'd like to slowly rejoice in our reunion after a long time,
the circumstances are what they are, so here I must switch with the involved other side.

name: Ded
text:
Actually, he's been noisy about switching since a while ago.
He is impatient by nature originally, but when it comes to you, he―

name: Ded
text:
Hey, don't go blabbering unnecessary things!
And while you're at it, refrain from thoughtless Santa solicitation!

name: Ded
text:
Well, I understand the feeling of wanting to keep [Player] close,
and that one over there looks like he could become quite an excellent Black Santa.

name: Ded
text:
Jagannath, was it? Not a bad look on your face.
I see you possess most of the elements necessary for a Black Santa.

name: Jagannath
text:
Heheh! Words of praise directly from the Black Santa,
I'll gratefully accept them.

name: Jagannath
text:
But, for today, I'm here to investigate as the police.
If it's okay, I'd be happy to hear about that story on your side.

name: Ded
text:
Ah... that's right.
Today is, of course, the story of that damn incident.

With a look of regret, he begins to speak the outline of the incident.
There is no particular contradiction with the information just shared at the station.

name: Ded
text:
...That is the summary of the incident. For further details,
do go ask Krampus. That guy's in charge of everything, anyways.

options.text: Don't tell me he was also in that incident...

name: Ded
text:
―Hm? No, naturally, he wasn't attacked.
There aren't that many guys with the guts to attack him.

name: Ded
text:
I had him do the hearing with the victim students in advance.
Which means―

name: Ded
text:
Toughness is required of the Black Santas.
But, on the other hand, a certain level of delicacy is also necessary.

name: Ded
text:
It would be unbearable to make such children
look back on the incident many times, right?

name: Ded
text:
So, we narrowed down the window.
Also, it's because he hoped to be able to concentrate on work right now.

name: Tanngrisnir
text:
The coexistence of toughness and delicacy―
Exactly one of the groundings required of a Black Santa.

name: Tanngrisnir
text:
That is why Krampus, an excellent Black Santa,
was entrusted with the 'delicate' hearing!

name: Tanngrisnir
text:
Yes, even I of the reindeer family would come to understand.
Of course, even the Black Principal who is the leader, despite his looks―

name: Ded
text:
―Daaah, you bastards!!
Don't just chat away on your own!

name: Ded
text:
Or rather, Tanngrisnir, aren't you the one lacking
that thing called delicacy, you muscle-brain teacher!?

name: Ded
text:
Before I make you eat a lead bullet,
guide the both of them to the dorms!!

name: Krampus
text:
...Ah, are you the police group that I heard about?
I was waiting for you. It's cramped, but do come inside―

Krampus, who opened the door in his own room in the dorm,
widened his eyes mid-sentence.

name: Krampus
text:
―Jagannath!?
And... even you, [Player]!!?

name: Yule
text:
Oh, it's true.
Though, why is [Player] in the police...?

name: Yule
text:
Or rather― Is this dignified tiger here
also an acquaintance of yours, Krampus-senpai?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Krampus
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Jagannath alone is surprising, but to think even you would come...
I really didn't expect it.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yule
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ahaha, I don't recall doing anything to get arrested though...
By the way, what kind of things am I being charged?

name: Jagannath
text:
Yoo, 'Schwarzraptor'.
No, wait, is it Krampus right now?

Officially translated, his nickname would be Obsidian Raptor, but for the
sake of integrity, I'm keeping it as Schwarzraptor for the duration of this story.

name: Krampus
text:
...I see, so your 'main job' was a police officer.
Damn, since you're usually like that, I completely forgot.

name: Krampus
text:
...It can't be helped, so come inside.
As a police officer, I'll believe in your good sense... about half of it, though.

The two guided inside sat down on the leather sofa
by the fireplace as recommended by Yule.

name: Krampus
text:
Ah, umm. So,
what should I talk about from where...

name: Krampus
text:
...Hey, what's with that interest making you
flick your eyes between me and Jagannath, [Player]!?

options.text: I mean, I'm a bit curious.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yule
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Umm, I'm curious too.
I understood the story that [Player] did a short-term transfer to the Police Academy.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yule
dialogue_after_selection.text:
From what I can gather, Jagannath-san is your friend related to martial arts―
Something like that?

options.text: First, I will interrogate about the relationship you have.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yule
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Wow, you look like a real detective, [Player].
Even though you just entered the Police Academy, that's amazing!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yule
dialogue_after_selection.text:
But, honestly I'm curious too.
I guess the two of you are friends related to martial arts―
Something like that?

options.text: It's alright, I have the obligation to remain confidential.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yule
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Wow, you look like a real detective, [Player].
Even though you just entered the Police Academy, that's amazing!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yule
dialogue_after_selection.text:
But, honestly I'm curious too.
I guess the two of you are friends related to martial arts―
Something like that?

name: Jagannath
text:
Oi, tell him, Schwarzraptor.
Don't tell me, you haven't even told your own roommate?

name: Krampus
text:
You... If you can guess that, then at least hide it a little.
I separated the names on purpose, you un-delicate bastard.

name: Krampus
text:
It's not like it's something I proactively say myself.
Besides, you hide it from your police colleagues too, right?

name: Krampus
text:
I'm not actively hiding it, so it's fine, but...
Yule, do you know MMA Fight Club (Surface)?

name: Yule
text:
Sorry, I'm not really into that sort of thing...
But, I feel like I've heard the name somewhere?

name: Krampus
text:
It's the talked-about MMA organization sung as up-and-coming in the world.
Flashy battles where striking and grappling are anything goes are a given, but―

name: Krampus
text:
Doing it without using any 'Sacred Artifacts' is the biggest selling point.
Since they can do shows for the general public and streaming, it's becoming extra popular.

name: Krampus
text:
Hombre Tigre of Lucha, Fist Saint Jacob, Avarga of Bökh,
Arsalan of Oil Wrestling, Bodybuilder Gargoyle―

name: Krampus
text:
Famous players from many fields belong to it,
and Jagannath and I too are tentatively members...

name: Krampus
text:
...Or rather, I was forcibly dragged in by this guy,
and forcibly made into a super flashy player...!!

Diagonally across from Krampus holding his head,
Jagannath continued the supplement aloofly.

name: Jagannath
text:
Generally there are no tag matches in MMA,
but at our Fight Club (Surface) that is also allowed.

name: Jagannath
text:
Me and this guy appeared as the Dark Fur Tag Team
with an upbeat entrance BGM, and rampaged in high spirits!

name: Krampus
text:
T-The high spirits parts were only you!
I'm... not that kind of character deep down!!

options.text: I'll go cheer for you next time!
But in reality, you did have fun, right?

name: Yule
text:
I can't help but wonder, what is it with the 'Surface'?
Does that mean there is one 'Underground' too?

name: Jagannath
text:
Of course there is one 'Underground' too?
That one's just underground content that can't be broadcast
on the 'Surface', and this guy hardly shows his face there.

name: Jagannath
text:
...However, I didn't know at all
that you hated it that much, Schwarzraptor.

name: Jagannath
text:
I invited you thinking you'd like it, but―
If you hate it that much, you can always quit, y'know?

name: Krampus
text:
―!!
No, it's not exactly to that extent...

name: Krampus
text:
You know― If it's a serious battle without 'Sacred Artifacts',
it won't heal if I accidentally get injured, right?

name: Krampus
text:
It comes as quite some trouble as a Black Santa,
but if we avoid the busy season, it's not entirely out of the question...

name: Krampus
text:
Interacting with the affiliated members is surprisingly interesting,
and external matches with teams like Ikebukuro are kinda stimulating too!?

options.text: As I thought, you are into it.

name: Krampus
text:
―Damn it,
didn't you guys come for investigation!?

name: Krampus
text:
Don't abuse your authority to pry into people's privacy!
And Yule, don't give them a hand either!!

name: Krampus
text:
Anyway, let me talk about the incident!
I've been preparing for it all this time.

Then, having finished the general briefing, Jagannath
ruminates on the content while leaning on the back of the sofa.

name: Jagannath
text:
I see. None of the attacked Black Santas
saw the culprits' faces, huh.

name: Krampus
text:
Yeah. There is the fact that the pattern of
having a paper bag put over from behind was the majority, but―

name: Krampus
text:
Even the bunch who could catch a glimpse,
testify that the culprits were wearing hats and hoods low over their eyes.

name: Jagannath
text:
A method the bad brats tend to use when doing bad things.
God, every single one of them just had to do the same criminal modus operandi.

name: Krampus
text:
...The fact that they are brats is probably true.
Everyone uniformly testifies so from their build and tone of voice.

name: Krampus
text:
This is the judgment of our trained Black Santas,
so I'm certain there'd be no mistakes―

name: Krampus
text:
To begin with, there aren't many guys other than
those bad brats who have a motive to attack us Black Santas.

Holding one of the left-behind articles― A 'threat letter' card to his nose,
Jagannath stared at the childish characters written there.

name: Jagannath
text:
'Stop Black Santa activities this year'―
Well, it's natural to see it as self-defense of those brats fearing punishment.

name: Jagannath
text:
Now then. What can we deduce
from the current information, [Player]?

options.text: We barely got any new information!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Don't assume the perp to always leave sufficient evidence.
If you are going to continue working as a police officer, you mustn't overlook even the slightest traces.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
For example...
Right, don't you think this crime is too short-sighted?
If they do this kind of action, 'punishment' would be waiting for them, don't you say?

options.text: It doesn't seem like they've thought this through.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Not a bad point of view.
This is mostly an impulsive crime due to shallow thinking―
Because if they do this kind of action, only 'punishment' would be waiting for them.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Oh wow, what an energetic reply?
Think carefully, the perp doesn't always leave sufficient evidence, y'know?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
For example...
Right, don't you think this crime is too short-sighted?
If they do this kind of action, 'punishment' would be waiting for them, don't you say?

name: Jagannath
text:
That they moved without even being able to think about that means―
One, that they are that scared out of their wits.

name: Jagannath
text:
Two, that they are well aware that they are doing bad things
to the extent that they can't avoid Black Santa's punishment.

Jagannath continues profiling.
Perhaps, what makes that possible was because
he can also stand on the side of the 'bad brats'―

name: Jagannath
text:
...It's just a hunch, but maybe those guys
have never tasted Santa's punishment in the past.

name: Jagannath
text:
If they had, they would be either reflecting or trembling in fear by now,
and there is no way they could pull this kind of 'bluff'.

name: Jagannath
text:
Meaning― They are still just some 'rookie' bad brats.
Well, there is a possibility they've done something considerable besides that.

Hearing Jagannath's analysis, Yule
muttered quietly, like something has caught his attention.

name: Yule
text:
Having a firm awareness of doing bad things,
yet moving in fear of punishment, huh...

name: Yule
text:
...I may be asking unnecessary things, but those
kids right now are practically 'bad children', right?

name: Yule
text:
I mean, in the sense that we don't know
how they were before committing the crime.

name: Krampus
text:
...Naturally, we don't know their past conduct, so this is just still speculation.
At this point, Tomte will probably move to begin his 'investigation', but―

name: Krampus
text:
Since they went as far as this evil deed,
it's almost certain that they will be deemed 'bad children'...

The room is filled with a short but heavy silence―
However, Jagannath stood up on the spot, breaking it.

name: Jagannath
text:
―Alright, is that about it for starters? Sorry for intruding.
Just leave the rest to us and concentrate on your important work.

name: Jagannath
text:
Regarding the status of the investigation, as soon as there is
any progress on our side, our headquarters will share it with Santa School.

name: Jagannath
text:
Heheh, when the busy season is over, shall we go out for a 'show' together again?
I'm very much looking forward to it, Schwarzraptor.

name: Krampus
text:
I-It's not like I'm looking
forward to it or anything―!

name: Krampus
text:
...Well, umm.
Maybe I'll be waiting for it.

When Jagannath and the other left the room,
Yule absently lowered his eyes to his hands.

name: Yule
text:
................
Investigating the Black Santas' attack incident, huh.

name: Yule
text:
[Player]-san tends to encounter trouble,
so I hope they won't get involved in anything dangerous―

name: Yule
text:
―Wait, huh.
Incoming call from Ryota. I wonder what's up?

name: Jagannath
text:
―Now then, I mostly expected beforehand,
but there wasn't any big harvest in particular.

name: Jagannath
text:
Well, it can be said that just gaining confirmation is enough,
and getting to hang out with Krampus was a bonus too. Heheh.

options.text: So... What do we do next?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Huh? That's already decided.
After all, I am the reliable local policeman, y'know?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text: Next, we march dashingly into the color gang's base, the underground Ikebukuro―!

options.text: You really like Krampus, don't you?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Well, yeah. He doesn't seem to be aware of it himself, but he is a good player.
He knows how to put on a good show, and he still got his charisma whether he wins or loses.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ah~ I'm really looking forward to our next time together!
Kuku, though, if you come to cheer, it looks like he might actually spin his wheels?

options.text: Shall we go for lunch, senior!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Right, there is a set meal restaurant I'd go to nearby.
Let's fill our stomachs to investigate with spirit in the afternoon too!

text:
Just when Jagannath shrugged his shoulders happily...
His phone in his back pocket rang its ringtone loudly.

name: Jagannath
text:
―Oh, old man, what is it?
We just finished the questioning here, but
if it's a report you're asking, I'll do it later, alright?

name: Jagannath
text:
Even so, we hadn't got much more information―
Wait, hmm. Did you figure out something at the headquarters?

name: Hogen
text:
Umu, it is some quite interesting
information regarding that color gang.

name: Hogen
text:
There was a punk informant that contacted several members of our department, and
according to him, there is a possibility they will participate in a 'certain festival'.

name: Jagannath
text:
―A certain festival...?
Speaking of festivals this season... Ah, that one in Asakusa.

name: Hogen
text:
Hoho, might just be that one.
It can be said to be supremely natural as a gathering place for those bad brats, but―

name: Hogen
text:
To participate at a time like this,
it seems like there is something to it, no?

name: Jagannath
text:
......I see.
Alright, [Player] and I will head straight to the scene now.

name: Jagannath
text:
I'm sure you'd understand, but do restrain yourself from raiding the venue.
Because, suspicion is still just suspicion after all.

name: Jagannath
text:
Besides― The bunch at that festival hate the police, right?
Heheh, it's becoming exactly the perfect case for me.

name: Jagannath
text:
Well, I'm a cop too, but half of me is like a friend to them!
So, just leave this case to case to these hands of mine!

Finishing the call, Jagannath looks at [Player].
Baring sharp fangs, he grins exactly like a bad brat.

name: Jagannath
text:
―From the looks of it, it seems like you and I
can go play at a fun, pleasant winter festival?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
What? You don't know about 'that festival' despite growing up in Kabukicho?
You must be kidding, right?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Gah, you're so helpless!
Then, I'll teach you about it myself.

options.text: That one in Asakusa I hear in rumors...?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
What, don't tell me it's your first time participating?
'That festival' should be perfect for me...
And of course, it would be for you too!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Heheh, don't get too excited!
Though I said that, I'm also pretty much looking forward to it!

text:
Right, it is no wonder that Jagannath is excited.
After all, at that festival, the bad brats from all over Tokyo meet in one hall.

name: Jagannath
text:
Asakusa, Shibamata, Kabukicho―
A joint event for the hot-blooded, festival-loving bunch!

name: Jagannath
text:
A year-end special― The 'Fighting Festival',
famous for those 'red-hot' floats bashing themselves mid-winter.
Let's go knock-em-dead with a one-two punch!

Prologue:
The Roaring Dragnet!
